name: Otter Mayhem
description:
Created for the Cal Poly Pomona Game Design & Development Club Winter 2015 Game Jam.

Defeat evil sea creatures!

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move and space or left click to shoot.

Created by:

Andrew Arroyo (Designer and Writer)

Ara Malayan (Programmer and Designer)

Byron Phung (Programmer and Designer)

Christopher Eduarte (Programmer and Designer)

Kenny Chan (Designer and Writer)

Lexia Andrade (Artist)

Shaina Marie Razon (Artist)
